text: Hanki Juda kini ne' Ahazia'a, Joramu'ma friaza negeno, Bet Hagani rankumategama vu'nea karanka koro freno vu'ne. Anama nehigeno'a Jehu'a amage rotago huno nevuno, sondia vahe'agu huno, agri'enena kevea aheho, hige'za sondia vahe'mo'za rotago hu'za Guri agonarega Ibleami kuma tva'ontega karisi'afi mani'neno koro freno nevige'za, kevea ome ahe'naze. Ana hazageno Ahazia'a koro freno vuno, Megido rankumate vuteno anantega fri'ne.
